channel.title: Microsoft rejects blu-ray, once again
channel.description:
[img]http://thug-life.org/blu-ray.png[/img] Sorry for large crappy picture, i had to quickly grab a camera :P
But yeah, after like the 5th time of microsoft "thinking" about buying rights to blu-ray, which is still pretty much still in the question but just not on their console. Anyway, i thought i would update you lot due to all the speculation on microsoft and sony being in talks about giving microsoft rights. It seems microsoft probably will get rights to blu-ray, just not for their console.
If Microsoft get blu-ray rights then since they do own the largest operating system in the world they could really forward the blu-ray format.

item.title: Microsoft rejects blu-ray, once again
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“kupo, post:3, topic:188877”]related to the XBox…
they would prob use it for all the hard drives and stuff too… put their graphics above the ps3 if they wanted[/quote]

you cant take two of the same thing and make one better without changing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Microsoft rejects blu-ray, once again
item.dc:creator: @Zigon Zigon
item.description:
@Zigon wrote:

They’re going to have to find a way around this, like thuglife said they’re not going to use the same format as the competitor to try and beat them.

item.title: Microsoft rejects blu-ray, once again
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“kupo, post:3, topic:188877”]related to the XBox…
they would prob use it for all the hard drives and stuff too… put their graphics above the ps3 if they wanted[/quote]
Ugh why would getting the same Blu-ray drive as the ps3 put them above the ps3? =
Anyway i saw another thing saying ‘Xbox 360 says no to blu-ray’

The only reason they were thinking about it in the first place is that HD DVD is officially dead and blu-ray wont he format war.
